title: Contemporary Khao Lak Resort Escape Steps from Bangsak Beach
description: If you have your heart set on an absolute beachfront retreat, Outrigger Khao Lak Beach Resort, located mere steps from the azure waters of the Andaman Sea, will fulfil your every wish. Watch the waves lap against Bangsak Beach while indulging in a fusion feast at Edgewater Restaurant & Bar. Tap in to your vacation spirit with a float in the infinity pool and an open-air Thai massage, or fully immerse yourself in Khao Lak's adventuring spirit with a yoga or Thai boxing class - you can't go wrong.
offer_address: 2/4 Moo 8, Bangmuang, Takuapa, Phang Nga 82190, Thailand
